name: f5anything
description: Put any terminal command in a launch.json to run it with F5.

command.description: The terminal command to run when this configuration runs.
command.default: echo Change this echo to your custom command

terminalName.description: The name given to the dedicated terminal F5 Anything creates for itself. Defaults to "F5 Anything".

terminalIndex.description: The index of the terminal to send commands to. When -1 or out of range a dedicated terminal is created and used. Terminals are 0-indexed in order of creation, not by visual order. Defaults to -1.

showTerminal.description: Whether or not the terminal a command is sent to is given focus. Defaults to true.
